mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(code, subject, content, userId) VALUES(#{code}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{userId})

INSERT INTO noticeFile(fileNum, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize, code) VALUES(noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{saveFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize}, #{code})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.userId=m.userId

SELECT n.code, subject, created, n.userId FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.userId=m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT code, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY code ) f ON n.code = f.code
ORDER BY code DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT n.code, subject, created, n.userId FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.userId=m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT code FROM noticeFile GROUP BY code ) f ON n.code=f.code WHERE notice = 1 ORDER BY code DESC
